name: ColumnTitlePipe
description:
Creates a column header title message.

Example :
title="{{ header | columnTitle }}"

The output will be e.g.: 'c8y_Temperature → T [T] (Area)'.
rawdescription:
Creates a column header title message.

```html
title="{{ header | columnTitle }}"
```
The output will be e.g.: 'c8y_Temperature → T [T] (Area)'.

methods.name: transform
methods.rawdescription: Transforms the column header into a formatted string with label and optionally unit and render type.
methods.description: Transforms the column header into a formatted string with label and optionally unit and render type.

jsdoctags.comment: The formatted string with label, unit, and render type.
